title: More atheist murder
author: VD
content_html:
While atheists love to whine about Christian wars that took place nearly a thousand years ago, you can always count on them to remain silent whenever atheists are occupied with killing religious people around the world today:

Hundreds of monks, nuns and local Tibetans who tried to march on a local government office in western China to demand the return of the Dalai Lama have been turned back by paramilitary police who opened fire to disperse the crowd.

The only time you’ll ever hear an atheist mention the ongoing atheist persecutions of Christians and Buddhists in China, Laos, North Korea and Vietnam is to try to explain that the atheists doing the persecuting are No True Atheists, and therefore it’s really religion’s fault when an atheist kills someone.
